1Password.about: Password manager and secrets management platform.
1Password.offer: One-time credit or discounted accounts available depending on eligibility.

AWS.about: Cloud computing platform offering over 200 services for compute, storage, and databases.
AWS.offer: Promotional credits for compute, storage, databases, machine learning, and training resources.

Microsoft.about: Comprehensive suite of productivity, collaboration, and cloud services.
Microsoft.offer: Free and discounted products including Azure ($3,500 annual credits), Microsoft 365, Dynamics 365, and Power Platform.

Norton.about: Cybersecurity software providing antivirus protection, firewall, and VPN.
Norton.offer: Deeply discounted Norton 360 and security products through TechSoup.

Webflow.about: Professional website builder and CMS for creating custom websites without coding.
Webflow.offer: 50% discount on Basic, CMS, or Business site plans for 12 months.

Wix.about: Drag-and-drop website builder with designer templates.
Wix.offer: 70% discount on 2-year Premium plan through TechSoup with free 1-year domain voucher.

Adobe.about: Professional creative software including Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro.
Adobe.offer: Free Adobe Express Premium, discounted Acrobat Pro, and discounted Creative Cloud subscriptions.

Canva.about: Online design platform for creating graphics, presentations, and marketing materials.
Canva.offer: Free Canva Pro with unlimited premium templates, stock photos, brand kit, and team collaboration.

Atlassian.about: Team collaboration tools including Confluence, Jira, and Trello.
Atlassian.offer: Free Cloud products (Jira, Confluence, Trello, Bitbucket) for up to 50 users.

Google.about: Google Workspace for team collaboration with Gmail, Meet, Chat, and Drive.
Google.offer: Free Google Workspace, $10,000/month Ad Grants, YouTube Nonprofit Program, and Cloud credits.

Slack.about: Team communication platform with channels, direct messaging, and video calls.
Slack.offer: Up to 85% discount on Pro, Business+, and Enterprise Grid plans for 501(c)(3) nonprofits.

Zoom.about: Video conferencing platform for virtual meetings, webinars, and events.
Zoom.offer: Discounted licenses for nonprofits under $10M budget with HD video, recording, and AI features.

HubSpot.about: CRM platform combining marketing, sales, and service software.
HubSpot.offer: 40-90% discount on marketing, sales, and service platforms with CRM and automation tools.

LinkedIn.about: Professional network for marketing, fundraising, and supporter engagement.
LinkedIn.offer: Discounted LinkedIn Learning, Recruiter, Sales Navigator, and marketing solutions.

Mailchimp.about: Email marketing platform for newsletters and campaigns.
Mailchimp.offer: Free plan for up to 500 contacts and 1,000 monthly emails with templates and automation.

Notion.about: All-in-one workspace for donor management, fundraising tracking, and documentation.
Notion.offer: Free Team Plan with unlimited blocks, real-time collaboration, and advanced permissions.

Salesforce.about: Cloud-based CRM platform for donor management and fundraising.
Salesforce.offer: 10 free Enterprise Edition licenses with Nonprofit Success Pack and discounts on additional licenses.

Asana.about: Project and task management platform for organizing work.
Asana.offer: 50% discount on Premium, Business, and Enterprise plans with timelines and automation.

GitHub.about: Code hosting platform with repositories, code review, and issue tracking.
GitHub.offer: Free GitHub Team with unlimited private repositories, Actions, and security features.

GitLab.about: Complete DevOps platform with Git repository management and CI/CD pipelines.
GitLab.offer: Free GitLab Ultimate for qualifying educational and open source projects including nonprofits.

Monday.com.about: Visual work operating system for managing projects and workflows.
Monday.com.offer: Discounts on paid plans with customizable boards, automation, and 200+ integrations.

Tableau.about: Professional data visualization and business intelligence platform.
Tableau.offer: Free and discounted licenses through Tableau Foundation for data visualization and dashboards.

Trello.about: Visual collaboration tool using boards, lists, and cards.
Trello.offer: Free plan with unlimited cards plus up to 75% discount on paid plans with automation.

DocuSign.about: Digital signature platform for electronic signatures and contract management.
DocuSign.offer: Up to 61% discount on annual eSignature plans with templates and 900+ integrations.

PayPal.about: Digital payment platform for accepting donations and processing payments.
PayPal.offer: Discounted transaction rates for 501(c)(3) charities with donation buttons and recurring donations.

Stripe.about: Online payment infrastructure for accepting donations and managing subscriptions.
Stripe.offer: Discounted payment processing for 501(c)(3) nonprofits with recurring donations and fraud prevention.

TechSoup.about: Technology marketplace providing donated and discounted products from major partners.
TechSoup.offer: Donated and discounted products from 100+ partners including Microsoft, Adobe, Cisco, and AWS.
